snippet: Government forces continued to pound the Damascus suburbs with artillery and airstrikes on Tuesday.
abstract: Syrian government forces continue to pound Damascus suburbs with artillery and airstrikes as antigovernment activists report that main airport in northern city of Aleppo is closed because of fighting nearby.
lead_paragraph: Government forces continued to pound the Damascus suburbs with artillery and airstrikes on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Syrian Forces Continued to Pound Damascus Suburbs on Tuesday
